Uses of Class
gametools.Area.Collision

    • Uses of Area.Collision in gametools

      Methods in gametools that return Area.Collision 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Area.Collision Area.Collision.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Area.Collision[] Area.Collision.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Area.Collision 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Sprite> Group.getAllWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the object (using the specified collision method) as a new array list.
      Sprite Group.getFirstWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the object using the specified collision method.
      Group Group.getGroupWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Returns a group of all the sprites that are colliding with the specified object.
      boolean Area.isWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and a custom collision flag.
      void Group.removeAllWithin(Area obj, Area.Collision method)
      Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object using a custom collision testing method.
